experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: In my current position, I primarily perform data visualization and analysis while advising clients on how to turn their data into actionable insights.

experience.title: SEA & Data Consultant
experience.description: When I started at Netprofiler, I was responsible for both our clients paid search performance and their data collection. Due to my passion for data and analytics, this role shifted to a more data oriented one. While primarily being a Technical Web Analyst, I also put in a fair share of data engineering and visualization. During my time here I also took on the role of project lead in Consent Mode v2 implementation. In this role, I managed the team and coordinated the project to ensure timely implementation for all of Netprofilers clients.

experience.title: Digital Marketeer
experience.description: After my internship at Cadform, I continued working there. In my new role, I managed various marketing tools for both B2C and B2B clients. For example, I worked on data (collection, analysis, activation), advertising campaigns, CRO, SEO, and email marketing.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: As an intern at Cadform, I carried out various tasks. I managed SEA campaigns and delved into CRO and data. I also did video editing in Premiere Pro.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: During my internship at NRC Live, I focused on researching the target audience for various events.

thesis.title: To what extent should De Consumentenbond inform and advise consumers about neuromarketing within e-commerce platforms to contribute to its ethical correctness?

minors.title: Neuromarketing
minors.description: Specialization in CRO to influence subconscious consumer decisions.

minors.title: Digital Marketing
minors.description: Specialization in marketing strategy, social media, and SEO.

tools.description: Expert in utilizing Google Tag Manager for efficient tag implementation and management. Proven ability to streamline tracking and analytics setup for advanced marketing insights.
Expert in using Google Looker Studio for advanced data visualization and reporting. Capable of transforming complex datasets into interactive and actionable business insights.
Highly skilled in setting up and analyzing data with Google Analytics 4. Expertise in creating insightful reports and (explore) reports to drive data-driven decisions.
Proficient in using Visual Studio Code for diverse development tasks, including coding, debugging, and version control integration.

Proficient in using GitHub for version control and collaborative development. Experienced in managing repositories, handling pull requests, and maintaining code integrity through effective branching strategies.
Skilled in developing custom Google Apps Scripts to automate and enhance workflows within Google Workspace. Experience in scripting complex automation solutions for improved productivity.
Competent in managing and deploying applications on Google Cloud Console. Experienced in configuring cloud services and monitoring resources for optimal performance and cost-efficiency.

programming.description: Proficient in Python programming for various applications, including web development, data analysis, and automation. Strong understanding of Python libraries and frameworks to build efficient solutions.
Competent in writing JavaScript for dynamic web applications. Familiar with modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries to enhance front-end functionality.
Proficient in writing and structuring HTML for creating well-organized web pages. Capable of implementing semantic markup and ensuring accessibility.
Adept at writing SQL queries to manage and manipulate databases. Capable of performing complex joins, subqueries, and data transformations for accurate data retrieval.
Skilled in styling web pages using CSS. Experience in creating responsive designs and utilizing CSS frameworks to enhance user interfaces.
